## DetailedSuccess.isSuccess() method

Reports that this [DetailedSuccess](./ts-utils.detailedsuccess.md) is a success.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isSuccess(): this is DetailedSuccess<T, TD>;
```
**Returns:**

this is [DetailedSuccess](./ts-utils.detailedsuccess.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, TD&gt;

`true`

## Remarks

Always true for [DetailedSuccess](./ts-utils.detailedsuccess.md) but can be used as type guard to discriminate [DetailedSuccess](./ts-utils.detailedsuccess.md) from [DetailedFailure](./ts-utils.detailedfailure.md) in a [DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->.
